reviewText: Product was as advertised...yet wife has yet to start to teach herself to play the piano she insisted I buy her a ew years ago.  It is just a dust collector :-(

FINALLY A SIMPLE UNDERSTANDABLE METHOD FOR ANY PERSON TO LEARN THE PIANO. THANK YOU MR SHORE.  YOUR METHOD OF TEACHING HAS GIVEN ME MORE PLEASURE THAN YOU CAN IMAGINE.  KEEP UP THE FINE WORK!
GERRY KALTER
